Articles.Content:
In order to help Squad to launch a patch in the consoles, let's use this post to report any bug in KSP.

Please, do not answer about the bugs with comments so that the post does not get full of random or useless messages , we put what is really important in one post.

Here's my Reports:
 

Spoiler

- Game total freezes when building a ship, frequency = All the time.

- Game crashes when i back to kerbin after a long time mission (after landing and recovering the ship, on the loading screen, the game just freezes or crashes). This was the reason i've lost my save file by corruption, in a mission to the moon.

- When i'm planning a maneuver, by a unknow reason sometimes the maneuver hud just don't let me use it, the circle with the arrows just disappear and i need to restart the game.

- Crashes and freezes on the re-entry
